mods.name: OptiFine
mods.desciption: OptiFine is a Minecraft optimization mod.

mods.name: Patcher
mods.desciption: Patcher is a Forge mod created to improve your all-around Minecraft experience.

mods.name: Essential
mods.desciption: The essential multiplayer mod.

mods.name: FoamFix
mods.desciption: FoamFix is a mod designed to optimize certain aspects of a modded Minecraft experience.

mods.name: BetterFPS
mods.desciption: BetterFPS is a Minecraft mod that add a few performance improvements.

mods.name: FPSReducer
mods.desciption: This mod reduces unnecessary GPU and CPU load by reducing the frame rate automatically.

mods.name: MouseDelayFix
mods.desciption: MouseDelayFix is a forge mod to fix the mouse delay.

mods.name: BspkrsCore
mods.desciption: This is a required dependency mod in order for any of my other mods to work.

mods.name: Armor Status HUD
mods.desciption: A mod that displays armor status.

mods.name: AutoGG
mods.desciption: Sends GG at the end of the game.

mods.name: AutoTip
mods.desciption: Automatically tips players.

mods.name: Bedwars Resource Display
mods.desciption: Bedwars Resource Display displays the amount of each resource you have in Bedwars.

mods.name: Block Overlay
mods.desciption: Block Overlay is a mod that displays a overlay over the selected block.

mods.name: Custom crosshair
mods.desciption: This mod allow you to change the style of your crosshair.

mods.name: Keystrokes
mods.desciption: Keystrokes enables the ability to show WASD, Left & Right clicks, and other miscellaneous items onscreen.

mods.name: OldAnimations
mods.desciption: Bring back the old animations.

mods.name: Popup Events
mods.desciption: Swiftly confirm a type of supported event on Hypixel.

mods.name: Potion Effect HUD
mods.desciption: A mod that displays potion effects.

mods.name: Quickplay
mods.desciption: Quickplay is a mod that allows you to quickly join a game.

mods.name: Resource Pack Organizer
mods.desciption: Resource Pack Organizer overhauls the Resource Pack screen.

mods.name: Reward Claim
mods.desciption: Reward Claim is a mod that allows you to claim Hypixel daily rewards in-game rather than through their site and leaving the game.

mods.name: Sidebar Revamp
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to change the sidebar.

mods.name: Sound Subtitles
mods.desciption: Backports the accessibility feature from Minecraft 1.9+ that displays sounds direction and names in-game.

mods.name: Timers
mods.desciption: Servers send Timer Data to Badlion, but this mod lets you see those timers on forge.

mods.name: TNT Time
mods.desciption: Display TNT's time until detonation.

mods.name: Toggle Sneak / Sprint
mods.desciption: Toogle sneak and sprint.

mods.name: Behind You
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to see the players behind you. (aka: f5 x2)

mods.name: Better Friend List
mods.desciption: A mod that improves the friend list.

mods.name: Bossbar Customizer
mods.desciption: Bossbar Customizer allows for customization of the ingame bossbar to your liking.

mods.name: Clear Glass
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to see through glass.

mods.name: Discord RP
mods.desciption: A Discord Rich Presence mod for Minecraft

mods.name: Glint Colorizer
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to change the color of the glint.

mods.name: Hytools
mods.desciption: Hytools is a mod that has useful tools for Hypixel.

mods.name: Item cooldowns
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to set item cooldowns (HUD).

mods.name: Replay Mod
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to record.

mods.name: Shiny Pots
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to see shiny pots.

mods.name: Simple Stats
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to see your stats.

mods.name: Skyblock Addons
mods.desciption: A mod that add features that will enhance your skyblock experience.

mods.name: Tab Stats
mods.desciption: A mod that allows you to see your to see stats in tab.

mods.name: Toggle Chat
mods.desciption: A  mod that allows you to toggle chat.

mods.name: Blur
mods.desciption: Adds a blur effect behind your inventory.

mods.name: Chroma particles
mods.desciption: Makes particles chroma.

mods.name: Hypixel Zoo
mods.desciption: A mod that says 'welcome to the hypixel zoo' when you join.

mods.name: Wings
mods.desciption: Give your player wings.
